One of the most enjoyable aspects of my job is to partner with Harvard and other local universities to teach students through project-based experience. The City gets free consulting, which is ordinarily very high caliber; and the students get a chance use their skills in a real-world environment. I just received [this copy](/documents/hksmag_14su_14-23_teaching2.pdf) of a recent magazine article on one of our oldest, and most mutually beneficial partnerships: Linda Bilmes's Advanced Budgeting course.
